name: Dead somewhere in the Sea
description:
the game was made for the lost cartridge game jam and was heavily inspired by the ATARI 2600 game console.

assets used

  • OLD TV Filter https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/fullscreen-camera-effects/old-...
  • A* Pathfinding Project https://arongranberg.com/astar/
